#summary datamodel of ginvoicing

= Introduction =

This page explain the datamodel of ginvoicing project.

= Datamodel =
|| *Categories||||||||
||id||String||PK||Encoded primary key||
||name||String||*||Category name||
||description||String||*||Category description||

|| *Customers||||||||
||id||String||PK||Encoded primary key||
||name||String||*||Customer name||
||address||String||*||Customer address||
||country||String||*||Customer country||
||phone||String||*||Customer phone||
||email||String||*||Customer email||
||notes||String||*||Customer general notes||
||enabled||Boolean||*||Customer enabled||

|| *Invoices||||||||
||id||String||PK||Encoded primary key||
||customer||Customers||*||Invoice customer object||
||date||Date||*||Invoice created date||
||amount||Float||*||Total amount of the invoice||
||invoicesLine||List||*||List of the invoicesLines object||

|| *InvoicesLines||||||||
||id||String||PK||Encoded primary key||
||product||Products||*||Invoice product object||
||price||Float||*||Unit price of the product||
||quantity||Integer||*||Quantity of products||

|| *Products||||||||
||id||String||PK||Encoded primary key||
||name||String||*||Product name||
||description||String||*||Product description||
||price||Float||*||Product unit price||
||category||Categories||*||Product category object||
||supplier||Suppliers||*||Product supplier object||

|| *Suppliers||||||||
||id||String||PK||Encoded primary key||
||name||String||*||Supplier name||
||address||String||*||Supplier address||
||country||String||*||Supplier country||
||phone||String||*||Supplier phone||
||email||String||*||Supplier email||
||notes||String||*||Supplier general notes||
||payment||String||*||Supplier payment terms||
||enabled||Boolean||*||Supplier enabled||
